issue.title: [Packaging][CentOS][Conda] Numpy not found in nightly builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5128](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5128). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In the last three days centos-7 and conda-win builds have been failing with numpy not found
- https://travis-ci.org/kszucs/crossbow/builds/515638053
- https://ci.appveyor.com/project/kszucs/crossbow/builds/23593736
- https://ci.appveyor.com/project/kszucs/crossbow/builds/23563730
